Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2901_08.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Snow is coming down hard where the memory ends.'}
{3: 'Right before his mind melts into the snowfield and turns blank... Noan has a dream.'}
{3: 'In that dream, he is the only person who dies, lying alone in the snow. Everyone else is safe and sound, living aboard Asslam.'}
{3: 'After his consciousness fades away, he has an agonizing nightmare.'}
{3: 'In that nightmare, he survived the fall from the speeding train, saved by a Construct.'}
{3: 'A mechanical firefly his friend gave him blocked the gunshot to his chest, saving him from a lethal wound.'}
{3: 'He keeps crawling on the frozen field, accompanied only by his pain and the realization that everyone he cares about has perished this winter.'}
{3: '—Do you regret it?'}
{3: 'The distant voice echoes by his ear once more through his memories.'}
{3: '—Would you have given that "evidence" away if you could choose again?'}
{3: '—Why the silence? Has your mind been assimilated by the memories of you dying?'}
{3: 'The voice sighs mournfully.'}
{3: '—Hey. When I left Medical Center 09 to find you, I left some "gifts" behind on your behalf for those who rejected Ascendants.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory289.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory286.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2901_08.jpg'}
{3: 'Get back to them before the "magic" on you is gone and save those you want to save.'}
{3: 'Appreciate the gifts of the Ascension-Network... then find me afterward.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory605.jpg'}
{3: 'Waking up from his long trip down memory lane, Noan can still feel the physical pain from the memories of him dying.'}
{3: 'He shouts for the Ascendant, but Lithos is gone after leaving behind his warning.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'The medical center...!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'If Lithos was telling the truth, then Medical Center 09 must be in great danger right now.'}
{3: 'Even though he knows it is likely a trap, Noan cannot allow the Corrupted to slaughter the people there.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "I'm sorry... I can't stay here!", 4: '1'}
